titleStmt.title: Lord Thomas and fair Ellinor, together with the downfal of the brown girl. To a pleasant tune, call'd, Lord Thomas, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A[lexander]. M[ilbourn]. W[illiam]. O[nley]. and T[homas]. Thackeray, at the Angel in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Verse: "Lord Thomas he was a bold forrester ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
On verso: The cabal: or, A voice of the politicks. [London] : Printed for J.W., J.C., W.T. and T.P., [1680?]. Cf. Wing C182. Possibly a proofsheet?
